text: Justice Jitendra Kumar Maheshwari (born 29 June 1961) is an Indian Judge. Presently, He is Chief Justice of Andhra Pradesh High Court. He is former Judge of Madhya Pradesh High Court. He belongs to a small town in Madhya Pradesh named Joura District Morena. He was a practicing lawyer in Gwalior before he got elevated to the bench. == References== * Category:Indian judges Category:1961 births Category:Living people
title: Jitendra Kumar Maheshwari
